name: You Are The Villain
description:
"I really liked the game sense of humor, also how it seemed you were drunk with the cursor moving weirdly, but nice job." - @Miner7365

"Silly little game where you shoot heroes as they pop up on screen. It's not too bad..." - @shadowspear1

"I loved the troll comments the villain made." - @Aviox

"...those lines are pretty hilarious." - @K-BitCRUSH

This time you are not the hero.

How can you handle yourself as the villain?

Made for GMC jam #2.

Total build time < 6 hours.
